author: {'steamid': '76561198798696985', 'num_games_owned': 616, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 9, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9, 'last_played': 1654093768}
review: 4399模拟经营小游戏，10多年前应该算是中规中矩，但不论是发售的16年还是现在22年，这个8合1的质量都难以称得上满意。折扣时可以怀怀旧，大多数人应该都不会需要这几个小游戏

author: {'steamid': '76561198129427702', 'num_games_owned': 348, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 3234, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 976, 'last_played': 1607642503}
review: I am so glad I have found this! I was trying to find where I can play Torys Shop n Rush until I came across this bundle on steam. Great price for 8 bucks. 8 fantastic games in the bundle, my favorite games would be Spooky Mall and Towers of Oz. I got a lot of my friends addicted to Towers of Oz..what am I even doing with life. Excellent price! Only complaint I have is that achievements are not available for this game. I wish they were to me that would make it even more challenging to beat the games.
